titleStmt.title: The regall apology, or, The declaration of the Commons, Feb. 11, 1647, canvassed wherein every objection and their whole charge against His Majesty is cleared, and for the most part, retorted.
titleStmt.author: Bate, George, 1608-1669.

notesStmt.note: Written by George Bate. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
